text: Lyndsy Fonseca (born January 7, 1987) is an American actress. She acts in both movies and television. She played Colleen Carlton in The Young and the Restless. She also played Alexandra in Nikita. Fonseca was born in Oakland, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Oakland, California Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Lyndsy Fonseca
